# Overview

_one design specification per issue._

_each specification should be "blocked" by one or more Feature Briefs or other Requirements_

_example specifications includes:_

* _State Diagrams_
* _Class Diagrams_
* _Process Flows_
* _System Diagrams_
* _Feature -> System -> Mechanic mappings_
* _Platform Specific Needs_
* _Performance & Optimization_
* _Networking_
